properties.title: Paisley Abbey
properties.description: Paisley Abbey is a former Cluniac monastery, and current Church of Scotland Protestant parish kirk.

properties.title: Paisley Museum and Gallery
properties.description: Paisley Museum and Gallery houses one of the largest municipal art collections in Scotland, including over 800 paintings.

properties.title: UWS - the University of the West of Scotland
properties.description: Located in the centre of Paisley - Scotland's largest town - the campus is just 10 minutes by train from Glasgow.

properties.title: Lagoon Centre
properties.description: The Lagoon Leisure Centre is the flagship centre of Renfrewshire Leisure and caters for activities such as swimming, fitness, aerobics, various sporting activities and events.
